Package com.example.hiveeapp.employer_user.applications

Class applicationsApi

java.lang.Object
com.example.hiveeapp.employer_user.applications.applicationsApi
public class applicationsApi extends Object
The applicationsApi class provides methods for managing job applications, including fetching applications, student details, accepting, rejecting, and deleting applications.
